derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: via French from Old French deien (see dean)

entry.tran: (某团体或职业中的)老前辈，资格最老者，元老
entry.def: If you refer to a man as the doyen of a group or profession, you mean that he is the oldest and most experienced and respected member of it.

means.word_mean: 1. a man who is the senior member of a group;

sentences.sentence: "he is the dean of foreign correspondents"
